item.description:
Attorney Ken Cossingham

Title Issues - What To Do and What NOT to Do

Attorney Ken Cossingham will take us on an eye opening journey of title cases. He will cover what to do, what not to do, the importance of title insurance and how investors can CYA. 

Attorney Ken Cossingham graduated from Suffolk University Law School, 1983 and has been practicing law in the Merrimack Valley for approximately 23 years. He is a member of the Bar in both Massachusetts and New Hampshire. His practice has consistently been in the areas of residential and commercial real estate, litigation, estate planning, business issues and business entities. He is the principal of Cossingham Law established in 1988.

Plus! BAREIA introduces the Midas Touch Series. Ben Thimas will present Rich Dad's 5 Steps To Building A Business Team That Wins... 


Leadership

Investing

Accounting

Sales

Marketing

Ben Thimas is an Official Rich Dad CASHFLOW Club leader, registered property manager, certified estate planner, investor, network marketing entrepreneur, who has personally worked and trained with Robert Kiyosaki.

Monthly Meeting

6:30 pm, Thursday, October 20, 2011

Doubletree Guestsuites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston

free for members; $25 for non-members

free parking
